titleStmt.title: Divine contemplations, and spiritual breathings of Mr. Henry Dorney
titleStmt.author: Dorney, Henry, 1613-1683?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Rawlins, for John Wright ...,

notesStmt.note: Numbers 170-179 not used in pagination sequence.
Imperfect: pages 3-38 of second page count lacking; pages stained and tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

(from t.p.) I. Practical discourses -- 1. Of the nature, means, and method of salvation, on Isa. 45.17. -- 2. How to find God a sanctuary in time of trouble : with the manner of the author's entring into covenant with God, on Rev. 1.5. -- 3. Of union with Christ, on Job. 17.23. -- 4. Of glorifying God, on I Cor. 6.19,20. -- With an appendix how to pursue a lawful thing lawfully -- II. His letters -- III. His last and dying speeches and prayers -- Also an account of his life, at the close of the preface.
